tran-wait: Plz wait for the transaction confirmation.
tran-wait2: All set, please wait for another confirmation
vault-warning: ⚠️ Make sure to always have a ratio above the minimum ratio to avoid getting liquidated.
warning: This project is in beta. Use at your own risk.

welcome.tcap-info: Total Crypto Market Capitalization is updated on-chain on every 1% movement
welcome.subtitle2: Trade TCAP using Uniswap or create new supply using a vault
welcome.subtitle3: Mint TCAP, or check your balance connecting your account

vault.no-connected: No wallet connected. Please Connect your wallet to Create a Vault and approve your collateral to start minting TCAP tokens.
vault.approve-text: Vault not approved. Please approve your collateral to start minting {{asset}} tokens.
vault.create-text: No vault Created. Please Create a Vault and approve your collateral to start minting {{asset}} tokens.
vault.ratio-warning: Ratio must be > {{minRatio}}% or you will be liquidated.
vault.hard-mode-info: Hard mode vaults have a minimum required ratio of 125%.
vault.hard-mode-info2: You're required to mint a minimum of 20 TCAP on hard mode.

errors.burn-balance-low: Burn value is greater than your balance.
errors.min-tcap: You need to mint a minimum of 20 TCAP on hard mode.
errors.min-tcap2: Afte burning the minimum amount of debt should be 20 TCAP.

farming.current-info: Early adopters rewards are issued over 14 days for a total of 500,000 CTX. Assuming approximately 6500 Ethereum blocks per day over 14 days (91,000 Ethereum blocks), the per block reward would be 5.4945 CTX split across the debtors at that point in time. 100% of the reward is immediately available.

univ3.claim-info: In order to claim rewards, you need to unstake your token.
univ3.current-reward-info: Amount of CTX that it's been earn while the LP token is staked. You must unstake the LP token in order to claim the reward.
univ3.deposited-info: LP token needs to be stake to earn rewards.
univ3.pending-info: LP token needs to be approved in order to be staked.
univ3.position-info1: Position Min and Max price represents TCAP per WETH.
univ3.staked-info: LP token is staked and earning rewards.
univ3.unstaked-info: LP token hasn't been staked or deposited.
univ3.out-of-range-info: You aren't earning rewards because the price is out of your position range.

monitoring.empty-info: There is not collateral on the vault.
monitoring.liquidation-info: Ratio is less than min required.
monitoring.ready-info: Vault has collateral and it is ready to mint TCAP.
monitoring.reward-info: Collateral amount in USD you are getting for liquidating the vault.
monitoring.tcap-amount-info: Amount of TCAP in USD you need to provide to liquidate vault.
monitoring.net-reward-info1: Actual profit in USD you earn after liquidation
monitoring.net-reward-info2: Net Reward = Reward - TCAP Amount - Burn Fee.

governance.stake-info: Stake and Delegate CTX to this Crypt Keeper. Each time you Stake and Delegate, you must wait a minimum of 7 days before you can withdraw.
governance.stake-info2: Approve delegating CTX tokens. You only have to do this once.
governance.withdraw-info: Remove delegated votes from this Crypt Keeper. CTX must be staked and delegated for a minimum of 7 days before you are eligible to withdraw.

form.name: Name
form.why: Why should users delegate to you?

errors.invalid-twitter: It is not a valid twitter username
errors.invalid-discord: It is not a valid discord id
errors.need-to-wait: Need to wait the minimum staking period
errors.too-long: Field is too long ({{max}} characters max)

errors.invalid-ens: Please enter a valid ENS name
